feed.title: Zhe Han
feed.subtitle: This is my personal website. I am a PhD candidate (4 years contract) in Computational Mechanics Group, Section of Applied Mechanics, Department of Materials, Mechanics, Management & Design, Faculty of Civil Engineering and Geosciences, TU Delft.

entry.title: Master Projects Outline
entry.content:
Abstract

My mater thesis is Study on the Transient Oxidation of Needle Punched Carbon/Carbon Composites with Multiscale Coupling Method supervised by Prof. Chuwei Zhou in Engineering Mechanics department, College of Aerospace Engineering, NUAA. This thesis explored the transient oxidation behaviors of carbon/carbon composites at various scales and their coupling model with the multiscale method.

I. Study on the oxidation and mechanical properties of needle punched carbon/carbon composites with multi-scale coupling method (National Natural Science Foundation of China)

3D Reconstruction of NP C/C Composite Micro-CT Image

Vertical Fiber Video

Horizontal Fiber Video

Oblique Fiber Video

Vertical Fiber Bundle Video

Horizontal Fiber Bundle Video

Curved Fiber Bundle Video

II. Stress analysis of pterional maxillary implant design in the fixation and repair of edentulous maxilla

Cloud Image of Maximum Stress Distribution on Bone Tissue Surface

Cloud Image of Maximum Stress Distribution on Skull Tissue Surface

entry.title: Welcome to my website!
entry.content:
üè† Introduction

  • This website is ONLY used for technology sharing.
  • Contents are mainly about theory and computational mechanics and programming technic skills.

üë®‚Äçüíª Blogger

  • My name is Zhe Han. I am from China. Now I am a PhD candidate with 4 years contract in Computational Group, TU Delft.
  • Before this, from 2012 to 2016, I used to be a undergraduate student ranking first in Civil Engineering department of Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA) and I got my Batchelor Degree.
  • After that, during three years 2018-2021, I was a graduate student studied in Engineering Mechanics department of Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA). In my final year of this period, I was awarded Chinese National Scholarship and Outstanding Graduate Award, and then I obtained my Master Degree.
  • My mater thesis is Study on the Transient Oxidation of Needle Punched Carbon/Carbon Composites with Multiscale Coupling Method supervised by Prof. Chuwei Zhou in Engineering Mechanics department, College of Aerospace Engineering, NUAA. This thesis explored the transient oxidation behaviors of carbon/carbon composites at various scales and their coupling model with the multiscale method.

‚õπ Interesting Fields

  • My research focuses on Solid Mechanics and Computational Mechanics of Composite Materials with Multiscale Modeling Strategy.
  • Besides those, I pay attention to the programming skills, though I am still a beginner on that.

üì¨ Contact

  • If you like contents I shared with you, please follow my website. I will update some technical blogs.
